this function creates the view of the game

creates the main game grid

Creates the top left menu
createRightPanel(Container) - Static method in class battleship.UserInterface
creates the panel on the right

E

F

friendlyGridArray - Static variable in class battleship.UserInterface
array of the friendly grid panels, the 0 row and column are the labels and 1-10 are the game grid

G

the main grid of the game

I
